update cl_inventory
factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
storage_leave_time = #{storageLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
storage_variator = #{storageVariator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cl_inventory set factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, storage_leave_time = #{storageLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storage_variator = #{storageVariator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_displacement = #{storageDisplacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_mileage = #{storageMileage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, storage_begain = #{storageBegain,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storage_card = #{storageCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_type = #{storageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_drive = #{storageDrive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_engine = #{storageEngine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_tap = #{storageTap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_transfer_times = #{storageTransferTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, storage_license = #{storageLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_prcie = #{storagePrcie,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, storage_user = #{storageUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_time = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
